Nightstrike::

Nightstrike was ready to fight when Megatron commanded him.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The blasts struck Megatron hard, and he could no longer try to 
ignore
> the damage. He slumped to the ground, beside Unitron, and shook, as 
he
> tried to keep a grip on Unitrons arm.
